name: Keep track of every Dialpad call in Google Sheets
description: Every time a call is ended in Dialpad, Make will automatically keep track of the call data and save it in Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19cGQ_58l0pl-j5l0OTpryf9707vQJmrNpXqWlvQjC3Y/edit?usp=sharing).
